listBenefit.title1: Find the nearest Technician to quickly resolve issues

children1.title1: How to change my name, email, and phone number?
Step 1: Log in to your account on the Vua Thợ app.
children1.title2: Step 2: Access the Account Settings or Personal Information section in the app.
children1.title3: Step 3: Choose the option to edit your name, email, or phone number and follow the instructions.

children1.title2: How to change the language in the app?

children2.title1: To update your personal information, follow these steps:
children2.title2: Step 1: Log in to your account.
children2.title3: Step 2: Access the Settings or Language Options section in the app.
children2.title4: Step 3: Select the language you want to use from the available list.

children1.title3: Someone is using my account. What should I do?

children3.title1: If you suspect someone is accessing your account without your permission, follow these steps:
children3.title2: Step 1: Immediately log in to your account.
children3.title3: Step 2: Change your login password to prevent unauthorized access.
children3.title4: Step 3: Contact our support department to report this incident and receive assistance in recovering your account.

children2.title1: What is the Vua Thợ Application?

children1.title1: Vua Thợ is an application that connects people in need of services with skilled professionals in various fields. We help users easily find and hire professionals, as well as allow professionals to search for jobs that match their skills.

children2.title2: Where is the application currently available?

children2.title1: Currently, the Vua Thợ application has been deployed and is operational in many cities and regions nationwide. You can use the application in any location where we are active.

children2.title3: I want to try Vua Thợ services, but I'm concerned about the quality. Is it good?

children3.title1: We understand your concerns. To ensure service quality, Vua Thợ has built a rating and review system for each professional after each completed job. You can review and assess feedback from other users to make an informed decision when choosing a professional.

children2.title4: How long does it take to find someone to take the job when posting it on the application?

children4.title1: The time to find a professional to take the job may vary depending on your location and the type of job. Typically, regular jobs can be quickly matched with professionals, while special or remote location jobs may take more time.

children2.title5: How can I know if this helper is doing a good job?

children5.title1: You can assess and review the work history of the professional through their profile on the application. Additionally, you can also refer to reviews and feedback from other users to ensure you choose a reliable professional with suitable skills.

children2.title6: How do I identify the professionals?

children6.title1: All professionals on the Vua Thợ application have personal profiles with photos, contact information, and ratings from other users. You can check the professional's profile before deciding to hire them for the job.

children2.title7: If I refer friends to use the application, will I get any promotions?

children7.title1: We have a referral program for users who refer friends. When you refer friends to use the application and they complete their first job, both of you will receive discounts or promotions for future services.

children2.title8: On holidays and Tet (Lunar New Year), will the helper come to clean the house?

children8.title1: We provide services throughout the year, including holidays and Tet. However, on these days, there may be a higher demand for services, so it's advisable to book in advance to ensure you have a helper at the time you want.

children2.title9: How can I use the service on the application perfectly?

children9.title1: To use the service effectively, you should:
children9.title2: - Review and select professionals with a good reputation and relevant skills.
children9.title3: - Provide a detailed description of your job so that professionals understand your requirements.
children9.title4: - Schedule in advance to ensure you have a professional at your preferred time.
children9.title5: - After the job is completed, review and assess the professional to help improve service quality.

children2.title10: How is the service price calculated?

children10.title1: The service price is calculated based on the type of job, time, and your location. Professionals will provide a quote based on the information, and the final price may vary depending on specific factors during the job.

listAccordion.title3: Actions on the Vua Thợ App

children3.title1: Can I schedule a technician in the evening?

children1.title1: Yes, you can schedule a technician in the evening. Vua Thợ provides services year-round, including evenings and weekends. However, it's advisable to book in advance to ensure a technician is available during your preferred time.

children3.title2: How will the technician contact me?

children2.title1: The technician will contact you through the Vua Thợ app via messages or phone calls. You will receive notifications when a technician agrees to take your job, and you can then exchange detailed information.

children3.title3: I want multiple technicians to assist with repairs quickly. What should I do?

children3.title1: To have multiple technicians assist with repairs quickly, you can create multiple job requests for different tasks. Technicians can accept these jobs and work together to complete them within a short timeframe.

children3.title4: Can I request a chef for cooking without cleaning?

children4.title1: Yes, you can request a cooking service without cleaning. During the job posting process, you can specify that you only need cooking services and no cleaning. The technician will fulfill your request accordingly.

children3.title5: Can I book multiple services simultaneously?

children5.title1: Yes, you can book multiple different services simultaneously through the Vua Thợ app. Just post a job request for each type of service you need and choose suitable technicians for each task.

children3.title6: Besides house cleaning, if I need a cook or laundry service, can Vua Thợ accommodate that?

children6.title1: Vua Thợ offers various types of services, including house cleaning, cooking, laundry, and many others. You can select the services you need and find suitable technicians to perform them.

children3.title7: Can I cancel a job after posting it?

children7.title1: Yes, you can cancel a job after posting it if there is a valid reason. However, please review the app's cancellation rights and policies for more details, as there may be specific terms and conditions.

children8.title1: If you cannot find your location in the app, try entering a specific address or the nearest landmark to create your location. If you still encounter difficulties, you can contact customer support for further assistance.

children9.title1: To reschedule a booked appointment, you can directly contact the technician through the app's messaging system to arrange a new time. However, please note that rescheduling may depend on the technician's availability during your preferred time.

children3.title10: Where can I track the order status?

children10.title1: You can track the status of your order directly within the Vua Thợ app. In the 'My Activities' section, you will find information about your current order, including its status and related details.

children3.title11: What tools will the staff bring?

children11.title1: The tools and equipment that staff will bring depend on the type of service you request. Technicians will bring the necessary tools to perform the job you have booked, such as gardening tools, repair tools, or cooking equipment, depending on your requirements.

children3.title12: Why should I rate the work shift?

children12.title1: Rating the work shift is an opportunity for you to provide feedback on the service, helping us improve and develop services that better meet market needs. Early shift ratings within 24 hours ensure your warranty rights in case the quality of the shift does not meet your satisfaction.

children3.title13: What will the staff do when they arrive?

children13.title2: Step 1: Greet the customer (C), introduce themselves by name, and start the timer on the work app.
children13.title3: Step 2: Advise C to store valuable and easily lost items in a locked cabinet.
children13.title4: Step 3: Inquire if C has any special requests (if any) or else follow the trained procedure.
children13.title7: - Are there any issues or unfinished tasks?
children13.title8: - Staff say goodbye to C and press the 'End' button on the app, then proceed to leave.

children4.title1: How can I make a payment?

children1.title1: Vua Thợ offers various payment methods to provide you with flexibility. The commonly used payment methods include:
children1.title2: - Payment directly to the service provider after the job is completed.
children1.title3: - Payment through the Vua Thợ app, using credit cards or e-wallets.

children4.title2: Will I receive a receipt when I book a service?

children2.title1: Yes, you will receive a receipt or electronic invoice after the job is completed. This receipt contains information about the services rendered and the amount you have paid.

children4.title3: Does Vua Thợ issue value-added tax (VAT) invoices?

children3.title1: Vua Thợ can issue value-added tax (VAT) invoices for services, depending on local tax regulations and requirements. Information regarding VAT will be provided on the invoice if applicable.

children1.title1: Can I schedule regular service appointments?
children1.title2: - Yes, you can schedule regular service appointments to have services performed on a fixed schedule, such as weekly or monthly house cleaning. In the app, you can choose the 'Scheduled Service Booking' option and specify the schedule and type of service you want.
children1.title3: I am using scheduled service booking, can I change the service provider?
children1.title4: - Yes, you have the right to change the service provider if you are not satisfied or for any other reason. In the app, you can search for and select a new service provider to replace the current one.
children1.title5: I am using scheduled service booking, but I have an unexpected event and need to be away, what should I do?
children1.title6: - If you have an unexpected event or need to be away and do not require the service during that time, you should adjust the service booking schedule to avoid inconveniencing your service provider. In the app, you can modify the service booking schedule according to your needs.
children1.title7: Can I cancel the house cleaning package?
children1.title8: - Yes, you can cancel the house cleaning package service. However, please review the app's cancellation policy and terms for detailed information about your rights and conditions.

children2.title2: - In the Vua Thợ app, the usual payment method is after the job is completed. However, you can discuss upfront payment with your customers and come to a specific agreement on the payment method.
children2.title3: Service Provider Wants Full Payment from Customers
children2.title4: Can I schedule regular service appointments?
children2.title5: - You can discuss with your customers whether they should pay upfront or in full after the job is completed. This should be agreed upon between you and the customer before starting the job to avoid misunderstandings later on.

children6.title1: What should I do when a Technician cancels the job?

children1.title1: If a technician cancels the job, you should take the following steps:
children1.title2: - Contact the technician to understand why they canceled and consider if you can reschedule for another time.
children1.title3: - If an agreement cannot be reached, repost the job on the app to find another technician.
children1.title4: - Evaluate and document the technician's job cancellation on the app to provide feedback to King of Technicians.

children6.title2: Why aren't there any technicians accepting the job I posted?

children2.title1: There are several reasons why no technicians may be accepting your job, such as:
children2.title2: - The job requires a specific skill that no suitable technician is available for.
children2.title3: - The proposed time does not align with the technicians' schedules.
children2.title4: - Your location is too far from the technicians in that area. In this case, you should try adjusting the job requirements, time, or location to increase the chances of finding a technician.

children6.title3: What should I do when the technician who arrives doesn't match the information on the app?

children3.title1: If the technician who arrives does not match the information on the app, you should take the following steps:
children3.title2: - Contact the technician to confirm their identity and personal information.
children3.title3: - If you have any doubts or safety concerns, stop the job and contact King of Technicians to report the situation.
children3.title4: - Note this discrepancy on the app to provide feedback to King of Technicians.

children6.title4: Why can't I use the promo code?

children4.title1: If you encounter issues using a promo code, you should check the following:
children4.title2: - Ensure that the promo code you are using is still valid and has not expired.
children4.title3: - Check if there are specific terms and conditions applicable to the promo code, such as the number of uses or minimum value requirements.
children4.title4: - If you continue to face difficulties, contact King of Technicians' support department for assistance.

children6.title5: If there is damage or theft of property during the job, how will King of Technicians handle it?

children5.title1: King of Technicians will seriously consider any damage or theft incidents. You should report the incident immediately and provide relevant evidence such as photos or specific information. King of Technicians will conduct an investigation and assist you in resolving the issue.

PrivacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.text1: We, VUA THO TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD (hereinafter referred to as 'Vua Tho' or 'we'), highly value privacy and the protection of users' personal data.
PrivacyPolicy.text2: This Privacy Policy of VUA THO TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD ('Vua Tho') will provide information on how Vua Tho collects and processes, stores users' personal data for the purpose of providing Vua Tho's products and/or services or conducting business transactions with users, and when users use Vua Tho's online services. This policy explains why we collect users' personal information, how it is used, who it may be shared with, how users can access, view, and modify their personal information. Additionally, this policy outlines the expected standards and control procedures for protecting Personal Data in line with policy objectives. We will also inform users of their rights and how to contact us.
PrivacyPolicy.text3: To avoid confusion, this data privacy policy applies only to individual users. Vua Tho encourages users to carefully read this policy and regularly check our website for any updates that Vua Tho may implement according to the policy's terms.
PrivacyPolicy.text4: For the purpose of this policy, please note the following definitions:
PrivacyPolicy.text5: established as a limited liability company with a single member, effective from the date of issuance of the Certificate of Establishment and Operation, and operating in accordance with the laws of Vietnam.
PrivacyPolicy.text6: means collecting, recording, analyzing, verifying, storing, amending, publicizing, combining, accessing, retrieving, recovering, encoding, decoding, copying, sharing, transmitting, providing, transferring, deleting, or other actions related to personal data of Customers/Partners.
PrivacyPolicy.text7: refers to any information directly or indirectly related to Users, and/or Users' transactions with us. Personal data includes basic personal data or sensitive personal data.
PrivacyPolicy.text8: are individuals who access, inquire, register, use, or are involved in the operation process, providing products or services of Vua Tho.
PrivacyPolicy.text9: refers to organizations, individuals other than Vua Tho and Users as explained in this policy.
PrivacyPolicy.text10: includes prevention, detection, prevention, handling of violations related to personal data as required by law.
PrivacyPolicy.text11: means the legal regulations of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam issued, amended, supplemented from time to time to regulate personal data protection activities.
PrivacyPolicy.text12: Please note that information that we cannot use to identify the data subject is not considered Personal Data. Providing personal data from users to Vua Tho is entirely voluntary, allowing Vua Tho to provide suitable products/services for users. Vua Tho processes users' personal data for appropriate purposes as agreed in the contract, complying with legal requirements or other purposes stated in the personal data protection policy below. In case users cannot provide the necessary personal data for Vua Tho to provide products and/or services, unfortunately, we will also not be able to provide those products and/or services to users.
PrivacyPolicy.phanA: Section A – Types of Personal Data We Will Collect and Process
PrivacyPolicy.text13: To help us answer users' inquiries and/or provide general products and services, we may need and/or be required to process users' personal data, including but not limited to:
PrivacyPolicy.text14: Personal Information: Information that identifies users, including but not limited to name, ID card number, birth certificate number, passport number, nationality, address, phone number, fax number, bank information, credit card information, ethnicity, gender, date of birth, marital status, residence status, educational background, financial status, personal preferences, users' email address, occupation, users' identification on Vua Tho's Website/Application, information about users on Vua Tho's Website/Application, users' field of work, any information that users have provided to Vua Tho in registration forms, membership applications, or any similar forms and/or any information about users that has been or will be collected, stored, used, and processed by Vua Tho over time, including sensitive personal data such as health data, religion, or similar beliefs.
PrivacyPolicy.text15: Information about our business relationship with users helps us conduct business with users, such as types of services we provide that may interest users and information that helps us adjust services to suit users.
PrivacyPolicy.text16: Information that users provide when registering for any of our products and services, including users' opinions through feedback or surveys.
PrivacyPolicy.text17: Electronic data or other information related to users such as IP addresses, cookies, activity logs, online identities, and users' location information through users' use of our products and services or as part of the process of sending to users. For example, users' call history to our customer service hotline and, if users contact us through our online services or through our website/application, details such as mobile phone location data, IP addresses, and MAC addresses. Additionally, we will record information about users when users start entering information into the contact form on Vua Tho's websites and send users' progress or completion status when necessary.
PrivacyPolicy.text18: Providing users' Personal Data is entirely voluntary. However, if users do not provide Vua Tho with their Personal Data, Vua Tho will not be able to process users' Personal Data for the Purposes and Additional Purposes as described below.
PrivacyPolicy.text19: If users are a partner, providing users' Personal Data is mandatory, and not providing users' Personal Data may constitute a violation of the law or legal regulations and may prevent Vua Tho from collaborating with users to provide services or products or to make payments to users for the products or services that users provide.
PrivacyPolicy.text20: Some Personal Data that we collect and process may be basic or sensitive personal data as required by law or natural characteristics. Users can learn more about how we process sensitive personal data in
PrivacyPolicy.text21: Some Personal Data that we collect is sensitive by nature. This includes Personal Data related to users' race, ID card number, citizen identity card number, religious beliefs, background information (including financial profiles and legal profiles, where permitted by law), health data, disabilities, marital status, and biometric data, if applicable. We only collect this information with users' consent and/or strict compliance with applicable laws. In cases where users are required to provide any documents or information to us for any Purposes that may contain sensitive Personal Data (not mandatory for that Purpose), users agree to remove that sensitive Personal Data before providing the documents or information to us.
PrivacyPolicy.text22: We may collect Personal Data, including but not limited to, users' name, contact information, and other identifying information, from other sources when necessary. These sources include:
PrivacyPolicy.text24: From our business partners, such as transport partners, payment service providers, ride-hailing service partners, and transportation partners.
PrivacyPolicy.text26: Credit bureaus and other credit reporting agencies.
PrivacyPolicy.text27: Publicly available data sources or government data sources.
PrivacyPolicy.text28: When our users add you as an emergency contact.
PrivacyPolicy.text29: When our users add you as a recipient or beneficiary of the use of any of our Services.
PrivacyPolicy.text30: When you use chat within the App; and marketing service providers or partners.
PrivacyPolicy.text31: When you provide Personal Data of another person to us
PrivacyPolicy.text32: In some cases, you may provide Personal Data of other individuals (such as your spouse, family members, or friends) to us. For example, you may add them as your emergency contacts when using the Application's chat feature or when designating them as recipients or beneficiaries of any use of our Services. If you provide us with their Personal Data, you represent and warrant that you have obtained their consent for their Personal Data to be collected, used, and disclosed as specified in this Privacy Notice.
PrivacyPolicy.text34: As a parent or legal guardian, please do not allow minors under your care to send Personal Data to Vua Thợ. In cases where Personal Data of minors is disclosed to Vua Thợ, you hereby consent to the processing of the Personal Data of the minors, accept and agree to be bound by this Privacy Notice, and take responsibility for the actions of the minors under your legal guardianship.
PrivacyPolicy.text35: Part B – How we collect personal data of Users
PrivacyPolicy.text36: - Directly from Users through various means:
PrivacyPolicy.text37: When Users submit registration requests or any other forms related to Vua Thợ's services.
PrivacyPolicy.text38: When Users interact with Vua Thợ's User Service representatives, such as through phone calls, letters, face-to-face meetings, emails, or interactions on social media or any other communication channels.
PrivacyPolicy.text39: When Users use Vua Thợ's Website/Application.
PrivacyPolicy.text40: When Users update, supplement, or adjust their personal information, Vua Thợ will also collect that information.
PrivacyPolicy.text41: When Users access our electronic news pages or Vua Thợ's social media platforms and/or download our mobile device applications, which may leave the device's IP address or data collected through cookies.
PrivacyPolicy.text42: When Users are contacted and respond to marketing representatives and User Service employees of Vua Thợ or participate in contests organized by Vua Thợ; from various entities or units under Vua Thợ; surveys, promotional programs.
PrivacyPolicy.text43: When Users provide their personal information to Vua Thợ for any other reason, including when Users register for a free trial of any services or express interest in any of Vua Thợ's services.
PrivacyPolicy.text44: - From third parties if they have been consented to, transferred, or chosen by Users to disclose. By agreeing for third-party controllers and/or processors of personal data related to Users to transfer Personal Data to Vua Thợ, Vua Thợ understands that Users have agreed to this Policy, and in the case of receiving data from those third parties, Vua Thợ will treat customer data in accordance with the provisions of this Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.text45: Part C – Purposes for which we process personal data of Users
PrivacyPolicy.text46: 1. For Users who are customers of services provided by Vua Thợ.
PrivacyPolicy.text47: To fulfill Vua Thợ's obligations under any agreements signed with Users.
PrivacyPolicy.text48: To provide Users with any requested services.
PrivacyPolicy.text49: To process Users' registrations and provide services to Users.
PrivacyPolicy.text50: When Users request to download and use Vua Thợ's application ('Application'), or to process Users' requests.
PrivacyPolicy.text51: Marketing activities, advertising, notifying Users about services, events, programs, or changes in Vua Thợ's policies and principles.
PrivacyPolicy.text52: To process, manage, or verify Users' subscriptions to Vua Thợ and provide benefits to subscribers.
PrivacyPolicy.text53: To confirm Users' orders and process payments related to any products or services requested by customers.
PrivacyPolicy.text54: To develop, enhance, and provide services to meet Users' needs.
PrivacyPolicy.text55: Collecting and demanding amounts owed by Users, investigating, analyzing, and resolving Users' requests during Vua Thợ's service to Users.
PrivacyPolicy.text56: To communicate (including sending Users management information and other information related to any contracts or accounts Users may have with Vua Thợ), to provide technical support related to Vua Thợ's Website and applications, or future changes to this Policy; to provide Users with access to content on the Website or application or Vua Thợ's social media platforms, to perform other User requests.
PrivacyPolicy.text57: Statistics, reconciliation, processing, and database management.
PrivacyPolicy.text58: Carrying out reports and explanations as required by current laws.

PromotionsHeader.text3: For any inquiries related to the promotion program, customers can contact the following address for guidance and clarification.
PromotionsHeader.text4: 32/28, Street 35, An Khanh Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City

RightHeader.title1: Lucky number to win electric scooters
RightHeader.title2: Join Vua Thợ for a chance to win a Wave RSX

Hero.text3: 01 Wave RSX F1 scooter for every 1,000 Thợ registered through the prize draw system
Hero.text3-1: Each Thợ will have a lucky number, and there is no limit to the number of lucky numbers to participate in the monthly prize draw

GuidelinesPromotion.title: Program guidelines
GuidelinesPromotion.text2: From December 1, 2023, until further notice from Vua Thợ.
GuidelinesPromotion.text8: Applicable to all users aged 18 and above who successfully register as Thợ within the promotion period (Main Thợ + Assistant Thợ).

ProtocolsPromotion.title: How to participate:
ProtocolsPromotion.desc: Users download the Vua Thợ application on the App Store or Android and register an account as Thợ.
ProtocolsPromotion.text1: After successful registration, each Thợ account will receive a prize code (also a referral code) randomly, automatically recorded into the prize draw program.
ProtocolsPromotion.text2: The program is divided into multiple rounds of draws; after every 1,000 Thợ accounts successfully register, representatives of Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited will conduct draws for the 'Prize Codes' from all sent codes to Thợ accounts, under the witness of representatives of Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited, representatives of relevant parties, and representatives of participating customers with prize codes in the 'Join Vua Thợ - Chance to win Wave RSX' promotion program.
ProtocolsPromotion.text3: The system will automatically conduct draws and select 03 prize codes for awarding in order of First - Second - Third. The program will be publicly announced online on Vua Thợ's media channels.
ProtocolsPromotion.text4: Within 24 hours from the determination of the prize draw results, Vua Thợ will contact the Thợ via the Thợ's provided phone number to announce the prize and provide instructions on the time, location, and procedures for receiving the prize. Each prize code is eligible for one draw only.
ProtocolsPromotion.text5: For prize codes that participated in round 1 (from code 0001 - 0999), the system will automatically exclude them and they will not participate in the next round's draw.

Reward.title: Prize awarding procedure:
Reward.text1: Upon receiving the prize, the winning Thợ must follow these procedures:
Reward.text2: For the First Prize winner, they must be present directly at Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited.
Reward.text3: Vua Thợ does not accept proxy prize acceptance.
Reward.text4: Prizes will be sent to the prize-winning Thợ within 30 days from the date of receiving the prize draw result. In case Vua Thợ cannot contact the prize-winning Thợ, or the prize-winning Thợ does not come to receive the prize within the specified time, the prize will be revoked by Vua Thợ, and the prize value will be converted into Vua Thợ's support funds.
Reward.text5: The prize-winning Thợ must bear all travel expenses, transportation costs (if any) for receiving their prize.

ConditionDetails.title: Details of applicable conditions:
ConditionDetails.text1: Customers who win prizes, please contact the Hotline: 0912 426 404 or send a message directly on the Fanpage or Zalo Vua Thợ for instructions on receiving the prize.
ConditionDetails.text2: The First Prize will be awarded at Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited, 32/28, Street 35, An Khanh Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City, or Vua Thợ will assist in sending it to the customer's home (if outside Ho Chi Minh City).
ConditionDetails.text3: The organizer has the right to use the names, images of participants in the program on the program's information channels & other media.
ConditionDetails.text4: In case of any disputes related to this promotion program, Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited will be directly responsible for resolution; if the dispute is not resolved by agreement, it will be handled according to the legal provisions.
ConditionDetails.text5: Employees of Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited and administrative-business block employees at Pho Viet Manufacturing Trading Construction Company Limited are not allowed to participate in the program.
ConditionDetails.text6: The program may end earlier than expected.

ImportantNote.title: Important notes:
ImportantNote.text1: For the Wave RSX FI 110 prize (not convertible into cash):
ImportantNote.text2: The vehicle value (25,000,000 VND) does not include registration fees and related fees; the prize-winning Thợ needs to pay the full amount according to current regulations (about 3,500,000 VND).
ImportantNote.text3: The prize winner must use the vehicle under the name of the Vua Thợ owner within 03 years for purposes related to services on the Vua Thợ application and is not allowed to buy, sell, exchange, or replace any vehicle parts or technical details without Vua Thợ's permission.
ImportantNote.text4: After 03 years from the date of receiving the vehicle, the prize winner can convert the vehicle ownership documents to their personal name without incurring any additional fees and can use it for other purposes.
ImportantNote.text5: For the Tiger Silver beer prize (can be converted into cash):
ImportantNote.text6: Take a confirmation photo of receiving the prize and send it to Vua Thợ (via Zalo Vua Thợ).

ProtocolsInvite.title: How to participate:
ProtocolsInvite.text1: Successfully introducing 12 new Thợ will receive 6 footballs (each football has 2 numbers equivalent to 02 Thợ) in an online form right on the Vua Thợ application.
ProtocolsInvite.text2: A valid series includes a series of 6 footballs (corresponding to 12 people introduced).
ProtocolsInvite.text3: The program does not limit the number of new Thợ introductions; the more introductions, the more lucky numbers you will receive.
ProtocolsInvite.text4: These series will accompany the Thợ throughout the process and continue to participate in the prize draw in each subsequent monthly round.
ProtocolsInvite.text5: Each account can win multiple times throughout the program. For example:
ProtocolsInvite.text6: Account A introduces B, C registers as Thợ, then A will receive 01 football with randomly selected numbers 3 and 5, forming the number pair 35. This way, if A introduces another 10 people who successfully register as Thợ, A will receive 05 footballs with random pairs 44, 82, 90, 61, 95. A has completed their first lucky number series, which is '35, 44, 82, 90, 61, 95'.
ProtocolsInvite.text7: Similarly, if A successfully introduces 120 people, A will have 10 series and unlimited introduction times.
ProtocolsInvite.text8: These series will accompany A throughout the process and participate in the draws in the next rounds.
ProtocolsInvite.text9: The program will start when the system records the first 100 lucky number series regularly every month. Representatives of Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited will conduct draws for the entire series of prize codes sent to the introducing Thợ account under the witness of representatives of Vua Thợ Technology Company Limited, representatives of relevant parties, and representatives of customers with prize codes participating in the 'Lucky Number' promotion program.
ProtocolsInvite.text10: The system will automatically conduct draws in sequence and select 03 lucky numbers for awarding in order of First - Second - Third. The program will be publicly announced online on Vua Thợ's media channels.
ProtocolsInvite.text11: Within 24 hours from the determination of the prize draw results, Vua Thợ will contact and guide the introducing Thợ about the time, location, and procedures for receiving the prize according to regulations.
